channel.title: Help?
channel.description: I have a 317 pi but I want to change the gameplay look. So example how to see how much ex you have done. How much prayer is left. Etc. I don't know if I've explained this properly. But the map area in spirites. How do I go about changing it? Thanks.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
